question: is it specifically permissible to use contraception because one wants to spend some quality time with his wife
answer:
QUESTION

you have provided many reasons as to when it is permissible to do family planing and when it is not....what i want to ask you is that is it specifically permissible to use contraception because one wants to spend some quality time with his wife for a couple of years after marriage? Jazak'Allah

ANSWER


Share:

The real purpose of entering into Nikah is to have children. Nabi [sallallaahu alayhi wasallam] is reported to have mentioned, ‘Marry women who are loving and who bare many children, because this will be a source of happiness for me on the day of Qiyaamat.’

From this Hadith, it is clearly evident that the purpose of Nikah is to have children. The use of contraceptives for ‘quality time’ are concepts created by the west. As believers, we submit before the will of Allah. Thereafter, whatever He wills is totally in His hands.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
